parameters.name: max-results
parameters.description: The maximum number of rows to include in the response

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: The end date for fetching YouTube Analytics data. The value should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Identifies the YouTube channel or content owner for which you are retrieving YouTube Analytics data. channel==MINE, channel==CHANNEL_ID,contentOwner==OWNER_NAME

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of YouTube Analytics metrics, such as views or likes,dislikes

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: The start date for fetching YouTube Analytics data. The value should be in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: dimensions
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of YouTube Analytics dimensions, such as video or ageGroup,gender

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A list of filters that should be applied when retrieving YouTube Analytics data

parameters.name: alt
parameters.description: The data format for the API response

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks

scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/yt-analy: View YouTube Analytics reports for your YouTube content. This scope provides access to user activity metrics, like view counts and rating counts.
View YouTube Analytics monetary reports for your YouTube content. This scope provides access to user activity metrics and to estimated revenue and ad performance metrics.
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube: Manage your YouTube account. In the YouTube Analytics API, channel owners use this scope to manage YouTube Analytics groups and group items.
scopes.https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtubep: View and manage YouTube assets and associated content on YouTube. In the YouTube Analytics API, content owners use this scope to manage YouTube Analytics groups and group items.
